function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Using vector notation to analyze the effects of chronic disease and environmental variables on COVID-19 mortality.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the results may lead to incorrect policy decisions regarding disease prevention and control.","Mitigation":"Thorough validation and peer review of the analytical methods and results.","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and analysis software for rigorous validation.","People":"Policy makers, public health officials, and researchers.","Owner":"Statisticians, epidemiologists, and public health experts."}]}
